hiveArticle.title: STEEM at $1.20 /// SBD at .92 Cents // Can you say SMACK DOWN.
hiveArticle.body:
Kaboom goes the price.  Talk about SMASH.  Just 2 weeks ago the SBD was at $2.44.  Steem and the SBD will have there day here soon.  No worries.  Good time to buy and accumulate.  Price sure is right. Thoughts?  
![german_roach_sq.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXgCrRzh1fzeBaR32MEbFPG7x7QwaP7yEHm99UDeqNgMq/german_roach_sq.jpg)
